> #Theme Maps; Theme Music
> ___
> ___
> 
> **What can be done?**
> Create versions of League of Legend's maps. They will not be different; kept consistent just as they are now - just a themed added to. These themed maps will be consistent with LoL's fictional world and alternate worlds. Additionally, these themed maps can include festive themes (e.g. Harrowing, U.R.F., Winter Holidays, etc). **All of them playing LoL's recent cool music**.
> 
> * [Associated Maps] - Maps Consistent With Runeterra Locations & Majority Skin Theme
>  * default theme (re-identified)
>  * Bilgewater Map Theme
>  * Demacia Map Theme
>  * Noxus Map Theme
>  * Zaun Map Theme
>  * Ionia Map Theme
>  * Piltover Map Theme
>  * Icathia Map Theme
>  * Kumungo Map Theme
>  * Shadow Isle Map Theme
>  * Shurima Map Theme
>  * Cosmos Map Theme (in space!)
>  * and the others...
> 
> 
> * [Promotional Maps] - Special Alternate Themes Of Specific Skins
>  * Sci-Fi Map (Project, Battlecast, Mecha, Eternum, Full Metal, Bioforge skins)
>  * [Bit Map](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/leagueoflegends_62_1920x1080.png) (all Arcade skins)
>  * Ancient Map (Sandstorm, Guardian of the Sands skins)
>  * Heavenly Map (Justicar, Arclight skins)
>  * Hellish Map (Blood Moon, Soul skins)
>  * Summer Map (Pool Party skins) 
>  * Draven's Map (Draaaven)
> 
>  
> * [Festive Maps]
>  * All the festivals.
>  * All the events.
>  * An eSports map?
> 
> **How can it be done?**
> Champion skin _archetype themes_: Many champions have a similar theme going on and others are alternate and outstanding. When the majority of chosen skins fall into an theme archetype an associated map will load.
> 
> More or less simple as that!
> 
> **What will this do?**
> Variety that will vastly improve the game on so many levels. Increase value of all those skins across the board (increased consistent RP sales?). Possibly even sustain an increased/increasing playerbase; increased profit yield?.
> You know.. That kind of stuff.
